<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82591</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82591</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>4345</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Omregning av lengder</string>
            <string language="en">Length conversion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Länge Konvertierung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conversion de longueur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conversão do comprimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conversione di lunghezza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετατροπή μήκους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conversión de la longitud</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Konverter fra en enhet til en annen (f.eks. fra cm til mm).</string>
            <string language="en">Convert from one unit to another(Such as feet, meters, inches, centimeters, miles, kilometers, etc)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">omregning</string>
            <string language="en">conversion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">lengde</string>
            <string language="en">length</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wandeln Sie von einer Maßeinheit in another(Such 
als Füße, Meßinstrumente, Zoll, Zentimeter, Meilen, Kilometer, 
usw.) um</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Convertissez à partir d'une unité en 
another(Such comme pieds, mètres, pouces, centimètres, milles, 
kilomètres, etc..)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Convirta de uma unidade ao another(Such como os 
pés, os medidores, as polegadas, os centimeters, as milhas, os 
quilômetros, etc.)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Convertasi da un'unità in another(Such come i 
piedi, i tester, i pollici, i centimetri, le miglia, i chilometri, 
ecc)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετατρέψτε από μια μονάδα σε another(Such ως πόδια,
μετρητές, ίντσες, εκατοστόμετρα, μίλια, χιλιόμετρα, κ.λπ...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Convierta a partir de una unidad al another(Such 
como pies, contadores, pulgadas, centímetros, millas, kilómetros, 
etc)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konvertierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Länge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">conversion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">longueur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">conversão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">comprimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">conversione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lunghezza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μετατροπή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μήκος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">conversión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">longitud</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
